CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper June 13, 1953, pg. 2, reads: "Prize-Winning Painting, Painter and Family - James E. Morgan Sr. is the first-prize winner in this year's 'Everyman's Art Show,' being held at the Arts and Crafts Center, having won the first prize for his painting, 'Capitulation,' shown here.... "
TitMainTitle: Mrs. Morgan and James E. Morgan Sr. standing next to his prizewinning painting "Capitulation," at "Everyman's Art Show," Arts and Crafts Center
